pages.text: First, you need to either have access to a brewing stand or have one of your own.$(br2)To obtain one, you can either steal it from a village, or craft it for yourself.$(br2)Once you have that, you'll need Blaze Powder, Glass Bottles, and access to Water.

pages.title: Brewing Stand Recipe
pages.text: You can craft this using the crafting table or workbench.
